casebody.data:
Holstein, Appellee, v. Registrar, Ohio Bureau of Motor Vehicles, Appellant.

[Cite as Holstein v. Ohio Bur. of Motor Vehicles (1997), 78 Ohio St.3d 1.]

(Nos. 95-2317 and 95-2547 Submitted February 19, 1997 Decided March 5, 1997.) Hunter, Samuels & Breckenridge and Donald O. Breckenridge, for appellee. Ronald J. O’Brien, City Attorney, David M. Buchman, City Prosecutor, and Brenda J. Keltner, Assistant City Prosecutor, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of Bryan v. Hudson (1997), 77 Ohio St.3d 376, 674 N.E.2d 678.

Moyer, C.J., F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Douglas and Resnick, JJ., not participating.
